questions.prompt: You find a mysterious cave. What do you do?

answers.label: Go straight in with a flashlight
Plan first and bring snacks and water

answers.label: Coach them calmly and cheer them on

Suggest rotating leaders each round

answers.label: Try many ideas quickly

questions.prompt: You find a shy new friend at lunch.

answers.label: Welcome them with a game
Ask quiet questions they can answer
Introduce them to your close friends
Protect them from teasing in the room

questions.prompt: You get home from a busy day.

answers.label: Recharge with rest and music
Look for a new mini-project to start
Call family and share the day

questions.prompt: A surprise match is announced tonight.

answers.label: Step up and join right away
Study your opponent and make a plan

characters.name: Pikachu
characters.bio: You bring energy, stay close to friends, and lift everyone around you.

characters.name: Eevee
characters.bio: You enjoy trying things out, learning fast, and fitting in anywhere.

characters.name: Charmander
characters.bio: You charge ahead with bold ideas and warm encouragement.

characters.name: Squirtle
characters.bio: You stay steady under pressure and take care of your team.

characters.name: Bulbasaur
characters.bio: You are patient, grounded, and quietly determined.

characters.name: Jigglypuff
characters.bio: You make others feel seen and cared for with your expressive kindness.

characters.name: Snorlax
characters.bio: You prefer calm spaces and steady progress over chaos.

characters.name: Lucario
characters.bio: You train hard and stay committed to doing your best.

characters.name: Gengar
characters.bio: You are curious and clever, with a playful twist to every plan.

characters.name: Psyduck
characters.bio: You think deeply even when things feel busy and strange.
